get.summary: Begin a new OAuth authorization process.

302.description: Redirects to EVE Online SSO login page.

post.summary: Load a new SDE to the database.

requestBody.description: EVE Online Static Data Export, in original .zip format.

202.description: Accepted SDE zip file and is processing.

get.summary: Returns information on a specific blueprint item
get.description: Returns detailed information on a specific blueprint item, by `item_id`.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The `item_id` of the blueprint to be returned.

get.summary: Returns a listing of stations that have corp blueprints.
get.description: Returns all top-level (stations) locations that contain corporation-held blueprints, including a count of blueprints at that location, and the office `location_id` for further parsing using the `/location/blueprint/{location_id}` endpoint.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Text search/filtering of blueprint names that count toward a location.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Blueprint type filtering for counting a blueprint toward a location.

get.summary: Returns a listing of blueprint & sub-items w/ blueprints at the specified `location_id`.
get.description: Returns a listing of all blueprints at the specified `location_id`, as well as a listing of all child locations that have blueprints, including their respective blueprint counts.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The `location_id` of the location being queried.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Text search/filtering of blueprint names that count toward a location.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Blueprint type filtering for counting a blueprint toward a location.

200.description: Successful return of the location's blueprint & children listing.

get.summary: Gets sankey diagram data for production chain.
get.description: Returns sankey chart nodes and links for producing a specific `type_id` item. Configurable with specific blueprints and locations.

get.summary: Retrieves a listing of all production queue items.
get.description: Retrieves summary information about all current Production Queue items.

post.summary: Adds a new item to the production queue
post.description: Takes the data information and adds that item to the production queue.

requestBody.description: The production item to add to the queue.

200.description: Successfully added item to the production queue.

put.description: Accepts a list of `queue_id`'s and uses that to reprioritize them.

requestBody.description: Array containing the `queue_id`'s in their priority sequence.

get.summary: Gets an item from the production queue.
get.description: Gets the details on a specific item from the production queue.

200.description: Successfully returned a production queue item.

put.summary: Updates information in a production queue.
put.description: Allows for updating some basic information in a production queue.

requestBody.description: The modifications to make to the Production Queue.

delete.summary: Deletes an item from the production queue.

get.summary: Get a listing of stations where an office is located.
get.description: Returns a listing of stations that have an active corporation office.

ProductionChain-TypeID.name: type_id
ProductionChain-TypeID.description: The `type_id` of the item whose production chain will be rendered.

ProductionChain-OutputUnits.name: output_units
ProductionChain-OutputUnits.description: The number of units of `type_id` to be produced.

ProductionChain-StationIds.name: station_ids
ProductionChain-StationIds.description: The `station_id`'s to restrict blueprint selection to.

ProductionChain-IgnoreActivity.name: ignore_activity
ProductionChain-IgnoreActivity.description: The blueprint activities to ignore in the production chain

ProductionQueue-QueueId.name: queue_id
ProductionQueue-QueueId.description: The id of the queue item to delete.

ProductionQueue-StationIds.name: station_ids
ProductionQueue-StationIds.description: A JSON stringified array of `station_id`'s to pull data from. If absent does not filter by station.

example.name: Covert Ops Cloaking Device II Blueprint
